FROM node:alpine 

MAINTAINER Carlos Yag√ºe, carlos.yague@upf.edu 

RUN mkdir /home/task 
RUN mkdir /home/input 

WORKDIR /home/ 

ADD . ./task 

WORKDIR /home/task 

RUN rm -rf node_modules 
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;
RUN npm run build 

WORKDIR /home/ 

CMD ["sh", "-c","node /home/task/dist/index.js /home/input"]
